downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 White Paper: Viewing Voucher Numbers and Journal Numbers when Summarizing Accounting Entries
downloadDescription: This white paper explains how to set up a batch transfer rule to summarize subledger journal accounting entries.

downloadFile.name: Viewing voucher numbers and journal numbers when summarizing accounting entries.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/5/b/3/5b347380-03bb-477a-aa33-588fb86ef768/Viewing voucher numbers and journal numbers when summarizing accounting entries.pdf

detailsSection: This white paper describes how to create simple free text invoices, journalize those free text invoices to the subledger journal, and then post the subledger journal entries to the general ledger.
detailsSection_file_name: Viewing voucher numbers and journal numbers when summarizing accounting entries.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
